meaningMnemonic: You receive <kanji>profit</kanji> at every <kanji>breath</kanji>. What kind of profit is this? It's <vocabulary>interest</vocabulary>. As time goes by and as you take more breaths you gain more bank interest.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
